commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Basa55515d"

diff:
"a55515d Bug 393556 - "Failed downloads not removed from active downloads array" [p=reed r=sdwilsh]
diff --git a/toolkit/components/downloads/src/nsDownloadManager.cpp b/toolkit/components/downloads/src/nsDownloadManager.cpp
index fedaa2b..3b04554 100644
--- a/toolkit/components/downloads/src/nsDownloadManager.cpp
+++ b/toolkit/components/downloads/src/nsDownloadManager.cpp
@@ -1528,6 +1528,7 @@ nsDownload::SetState(DownloadState aState)
   switch (aState) {
     case nsIDownloadManager::DOWNLOAD_BLOCKED:
     case nsIDownloadManager::DOWNLOAD_CANCELED:
+    case nsIDownloadManager::DOWNLOAD_FAILED:
       mDownloadManager->CompleteDownload(this);
       break;
 #ifdef XP_WIN
"
